mapper.select: select a.id aid,a.title atitle,a.score,a.broadcast,a.counts,a.pub_date pubDate, a.description,a.album_image albumImage,a.author, b.id bid,b.title btitle,b.size,b.duration,b.download_url downloadUrl, b.upload_date uploadDate from (select * from album order by id desc limit ${(page-1)*rows},${rows}) a left join chapters b on a.id=b.album_id

select a.id aid,a.title atitle,a.score,a.broadcast,a.counts,a.pub_date pubDate, a.description,a.album_image albumImage,a.author, b.id bid,b.title btitle,b.size,b.duration,b.download_url downloadUrl, b.upload_date uploadDate from album a left join chapters b on a.id=b.album_id where a.id=#{id} order by a.id desc
